title: Seachem Prime Water Conditioner
notes: Concentrated conditioner that detoxifies chlorine, chloramine, and ammonia instantly.

title: Fritz Complete Water Conditioner
notes: One-step conditioner that neutralizes chlorine, chloramine, and heavy metals while supporting slime coat.

title: Seachem Stability Biological Starter
notes: Seeds biofilters with nitrifying bacteria to steady new tanks or after deep cleanings.

title: Tetra Min Tropical Flakes
notes: Daily staple flake that breaks down easily for small and mid-size community fish.

title: Hikari Micro Pellets
notes: Slow-sinking micro pellets sized for nano fish, rasboras, and gouramis.

title: Omega One Freeze-Dried Bloodworms
notes: High-protein treat to boost color—offer sparingly once or twice per week.

title: Hikari Algae Wafers
notes: Sinking wafers that hold shape for plecos, otos, and other bottom grazers.

title: API Freshwater Master Test Kit
notes: Liquid test kit covering ammonia, nitrite, nitrate, and pH for precise tracking.

title: Digital TDS Meter
notes: Handheld meter to catch mineral creep or dilution trends between water changes.

title: Floating Thermometer
notes: Simple glass backup to verify heater and controller accuracy.

title: Python Gravel Vacuum
notes: Hooks to a faucet for no-bucket gravel cleaning and quick refills.

title: Aqueon Water Changer Kit
notes: Faucet-driven siphon with flow control ideal for tight spaces.

title: Microfiber Towel Pack
notes: Dedicated lint-free towels to dry lids, glass, and hands without streaks.

title: Algae Scraper Pad
notes: Non-scratch pad to clear film algae on glass or acrylic.

title: Surge Protected Power Strip
notes: Mount above the floor to guard gear against splashes and surges.

title: Outlet Timer for Lights
notes: Automates photoperiods so lighting stays consistent for fish and plants.

title: GFCI Safety Adapter Plug
notes: Adds ground-fault protection without rewiring outlets—perfect for rentals.
